description: Personal identifiable information related to the transaction

originatorPersons.description: Information about the originator of the transaction

primaryIdentifier.description: The primary identifier of the name. The value must be encrypted.

secondaryIdentifier.description: The secondary identifier of the name. The value must be encrypted.

nameIdentifierType.description: The type of the name identifier. The value must be encrypted. The value must be one of the following: [LEGL, DBA, TRAD, NICK, ALIA, MAID, FORM, PREV, BORN, OTHR].

primaryIdentifier.description: The primary identifier of the name. The value must be encrypted.

secondaryIdentifier.description: The secondary identifier of the name. The value must be encrypted.

nameIdentifierType.description: The type of the name identifier. The value must be encrypted. The value must be one of the following: [LEGL, DBA, TRAD, NICK, ALIA, MAID, FORM, PREV, BORN, OTHR].

primaryIdentifier.description: The primary identifier of the name. The value must be encrypted.

secondaryIdentifier.description: The secondary identifier of the name. The value must be encrypted.

nameIdentifierType.description: The type of the name identifier. The value must be encrypted. The value must be one of the following: [LEGL, DBA, TRAD, NICK, ALIA, MAID, FORM, PREV, BORN, OTHR].

name.description: An array of structured name identifiers for the natural person, referencing the TravelRuleNaturalPersonNameIdentifier schema.

streetName.description: Name of a street or thoroughfare. The value must be encrypted.

townName.description: Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government. The value must be encrypted.

country.description: Nation with its own government (ISO-3166 Alpha-2 country code). The value must be encrypted.

buildingNumber.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street. The value must be encrypted.

postCode.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail. The value must be encrypted.

addressType.description: Specifies the type of address. Acceptable values are: - 'HOME': Residential, the home address - 'BIZZ': Business, the business address - 'GEOG': Geographic, an unspecified physical (geographical) address The value must be encrypted.

department.description: Identification of a division of a large organisation or building. The value must be encrypted.

subDepartment.description: Identification of a sub-division of a large organisation or building. The value must be encrypted.

buildingName.description: Name of the building or house. The value must be encrypted.

floor.description: Floor or storey within a building. The value must be encrypted.

postBox.description: Numbered box in a post office. The value must be encrypted.

room.description: Building room number. The value must be encrypted.

townLocationName.description: Specific location name within the town. The value must be encrypted.

districtName.description: Identifies a subdivision within a country subdivision. The value must be encrypted.

countrySubDivision.description: Identifies a subdivision of a country such as state, region, or province. The value must be encrypted.

addressLine.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, presented in free format text. Each item must be encrypted.

geographicAddress.description: An array of geographic addresses associated with the natural person, referencing the TravelRuleGeographicAddress schema.

nationalIdentification.description: Represents a national identifier for a person or entity

countryOfIssue.description: Country that issued the national identifier (ISO-3166 Alpha-2 country code). The value must be encrypted.

nationalIdentifier.description: National identifier (max 35 characters). The value must be encrypted.

nationalIdentifierType.description: Type of national identifier. Acceptable values include: - 'PASSPORT': Passport number - 'NATIONAL_ID': National identification number - 'TAX_ID': Tax identification number - 'SOCIAL_SECURITY': Social security number The value must be encrypted.

registrationAuthority.description: Registration authority (format -> RA followed by 6 digits). The value must be encrypted.

dateAndPlaceOfBirth.description: Represents the date and place of birth for a natural person

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth. The value must be encrypted.

placeOfBirth.description: Place of birth. The value must be encrypted.

customerIdentification.description: A unique identifier for the customer within the organization's context. The value must be encrypted.

countryOfResidence.description: The ISO-3166 Alpha-2 country code of the natural person's residence. The value must be encrypted.

customerNumber.description: A distinct identifier that uniquely identifies the customer within the organization. The value must be encrypted.

legalPersonName.description: Name by which the legal person is known. The value must be encrypted.

legalPersonNameIdentifierType.description: Specifies the type of name for a legal person. Acceptable values are: - 'REGISTERED': The official registered name. - 'TRADE': A trading name or DBA (Doing Business As) name. - 'OTHER': Any other type of name. The value must be encrypted.
